title: Eurasia Advisors' Conn on Investing in Russia, Ukraine (Audio)
itunes:title: Eurasia Advisors' Conn on Investing in Russia, Ukraine (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Richard Conn, Managing Partner Eurasia Advisors, on investing in Russia, Ukraine and CIS markets, and how Brexit has impacted the region.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
